scripts.build: pnpm run clean && astro check && astro build --prerender && pnpm run optimize:full && astro build
scripts.deploy: astro build && wrangler deploy && pnpm run github
scripts.github: git add . && git commit -m "Deploy: $(date +'%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S')" && git push origin HEAD
scripts.optimize:full: pnpm run build && pnpm run optimize:preloads && pnpm run optimize:images
